data.text: Pabitra was fantastic on handling the room cleaning very professional punctual and worked diligently the whole time. She made the house look as good as it possibly could. We were very pleased! It was very thorough, and everything was put back in its place. The cleaners were friendly, kind and conscientious and treated my house and my belongings with care. I most definitely will use this cleaning service again!
data.title: Fantastic service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,
It was a pleasure having you as a guest during your recent visit to J5 Hotels Port Saeed. We are very delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience during your stay with us. We appreciate your positive feedback about our staff and the service rendered while staying with us. 
Thank you once again for the lovely review. We look forward to more of your many future visits.
Warm regards,
J5 Hotels Port Saeed Team
owner_response.author: Ayman Gamal

data.text: This hotel is very good, the location is convenient. The clean service by Pabitra is very good. I will suggest my friends to choose this hotel next time. Meanwhile, I like the breakfast in reaturants. Also the swimming pool on the roof is very.
data.title: The hotel is  very beautifully, the service is perftct. All staff in hotel are very friendly. I will select this hotel .

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us.
We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience during your stay with us and that the hotel location, breakfast, pool, and service met your expectations. 
It is also wonderful to know how you appreciated the housekeeping service of Pabitra while staying with us. Iâ€™m sure she will be thrilled to hear about your recognition.
It was a pleasure serving you. My colleagues and I look forward to welcoming you back again for another memorable experience here at J5 Hotels Port Saeed.
Sincerely yours,
J5 Hotels Port Saeed Team

data.text: The hotel was very very good . The hotel near by airport. The staff are very respectful and polite. Special assaff and pabitra. Also supervisor yamen  many thanks for him . The Italian restaurant is delicious .. I recommend it. Visit the hotel again
data.title: Excelent service is like five stars hotels .. and the location very very good and the staff were very very respectful. .

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member,
Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us.
We are glad that youâ€™re happy with your stay and find the property and location to your satisfaction. 
It is a joy to know also that you appreciated the extra mile extended by our staff that made your stay so memorable. We will share this review with everyone, especially all the staff mentioned to let them know that they've exceeded your expectations.
We are also pleased to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience at our Italian restaurant, Pizza e Pasta, and would recommend it. Thank you once again. We look forward to being of service to you again soon.

owner_response.author: Ayman Gamal

data.text: The hotel is very special and beautiful, close to the Deira City Center and the metro station, and also to the airport. The staff are very respectful and polite, specifically Contra, Miss Mai, and Mr. Taha. Many thanks to them. In addition to the services in the hotel, there is an Italian restaurant that is distinguished by its delicious and varied meals. I recommend it. Visit and stay in the hotel
data.title: Thanks for Kumara and Mai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tripadvisor Member, 
Thank you for sharing your recent experience at J5 Hotels Port Saeed. We are delighted to hear that you had a lovely stay and that the property met your needs and expectations. We are also glad to know that you find the hotel in a good location, near the mall, metro station, and airport, which are convenient for our guests. It is heartwarming to know that our staff delighted you, and thank you for acknowledging them as respectful and polite. Rest assured, your kind words will be shared with Kolade, Mai, Taha, and the entire team. We are also pleased to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience at our Italian restaurant, Pizza e Pasta, and would recommend it. Thank you once again. We look forward to being of service to you again soon. 
Warm regards,
J5 Hotels Port Saeed Team
owner_response.author: Ayman Gamal
